# sectionIndexTitles

**Instance Property**

Returns the list of section-index titles for the table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sectionIndexTitles: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the localized list of section-index titles sorted according to the specified ordering (for example, A through Z in US English). In its implementation of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewDataSource/sectionIndexTitles(for:)], the data source can call this method on the indexed-collation object and pass back the result.

## Providing section index data to the table view

- **sectionTitles**: Returns the list of section titles for the table view.
- **section(forSectionIndexTitle:)**: Returns the section that the table view should scroll to for the given index title.
